original_title: 実録!!ほんとにあった恐怖の投稿映像 22
overview: The 22nd installment of a popular series that introduces all 10 episodes of carefully selected horror videos that have been posted! ! So far, I've introduced strange phenomena that are reflected in home videos of ordinary households, and ghosts that have slipped into surveillance cameras. This time too, in "Midnight Slide", a friend and I are playing while sliding down a large slide in the middle of the night. encounter a terrifying phenomenon.
title: Actual Record! Real Horror Posted Video 22
